name: agentic-usage-monitor
description: Real-time Claude rate limit monitoring tool for AI coding agents

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun && bun build src/cli/index.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --target bun
scripts.dev:plugin: mkdir -p plugin-test/.opencode/plugins && bun build src/index.ts --outfile plugin-test/.opencode/plugins/usage-monitor.js --target bun --watch
scripts.dev:install: bun run build && bun run install:local
scripts.test:e2e:report: mkdir -p test-results && bun test test/e2e 2>&1 | tee test-results/output.txt && bun run test/harness/generate-report.ts
scripts.install:local: bun run build && mkdir -p ~/.config/opencode/plugins && cp dist/index.js ~/.config/opencode/plugins/usage-monitor.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run build
